name: Kamailio
description: Open SIP server. Commonly used SIP server for Audio contribution over IP using SIP (EBU ACIP)

name: PJSIP
description: Open Source multimedia library implementing SIP, SDP, RTP, STUN, TURN, and ICE. Used in some contribution equipment (dual licensing).

name: OpenOB
description: Open Outside Broadcast project for radio contribution links and studio-transmitter links based on Opus.

name: Opus
description: Opus is a totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.

name: FLAC
description: FLAC Free Lossless Audio Coding. Used by some broadcaster for audio exchange, storage.

name: Lame
description: Lame, high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder. (Warning, MP3 is not royalty free!)

name: TwoLame
description: TwoLame, MPEG Audio Layer 2 (MP2) encoder.

name: dvbcss-synctiming
description: dvbcss-synctiming is a system for measuring how accurately a TV or companion are synchronised.

name: pydvbcss
description: pydvbcss is library implementing the DVB Companion Screens and Streams protocols for accurately synchronising media playback between TVs and companions.

name: Cross-Platform Authentication
description: CPA offers an open standard for associating any media device with an online identity.

name: TAL
description: The TV Application Layer (TAL) is an open source library for building applications for Connected TV devices.

name: StormCV
description: Apache Storm + OpenCV = large scale distributed image and video analysis.

name: DTT 2 IP
description: Broadcast to IP conversion for Wifi indoor coverage.

name: DVB Inspector
description: DVB Inspector is an open-source DVB analyzer.

name: DVBlast
description: DVBlast is a simple and powerful MPEG-2/TS demux and streaming application.

name: Opencaster
description: OpenCaster is a free and open source MPEG2 transport stream data generator and packet manipulator.

name: WiFiBroadcast
description: Analog-like transmission of live video data.

name: Aurena
description: Aurena is a network distributed media playback system.

name: CasparCG
description: CasparCG is a professional graphics and video play-out software, proven in 24/7 broadcasts since 2006

name: i-Score
description: A free and open-source intermedia sequencer

name: RadioDNS Manager
description: A platform to manage Hybrid Radio static services such as RadioVIS, RadioEPG and Service Following.

name: RadioTag.js
description: RadioTag client library in javascript.

name: RadioVis Html Player
description: RadioVis Player using WebSocket.

name: Dash.js
description: A reference client implementation for the playback of MPEG DASH via Javascript and compliant browsers.

name: Kodi
description: A software media player and entertainment hub for digital media.

name: Peaks.js
description: Browser-based audio waveform visualisation.

name: VLC
description: Simple, fast and powerful media player.

name: GPAC
description: Multimedia player, packager and tools

name: rx-player
description: HTML5/Javascript video player with some reactive programming inside, supporting MPEG-DASH and SmoothStreaming transports.

name: BMXlib
description: Library and utilities to read and write broadcasting media files. Primarily supports the MXF file format.

name: jebu-core
description: EBUCore XML Schema Java port. Java port of TECH 3293 EBU CORE METADATA SET (EBUCore) SPECIFICATION v. 1.5, including new Audio Definition Model.

name: Ledger
description: Node.js implementation of the NMOS registration and discovery specifications.

name: MAJ API
description: Pure Java library for reading and writing MXF and AAF files.

name: AvTranscoder
description: Based on FFmpeg/LibAV libraries to support various video and audio formats, avTranscoder provides the high level API to re-wrap or transcode media easily. It also provide bindings for any usage in Java or Python.

name: Bento4
description: Full-featured MP4 format and MPEG DASH C++ class library and tools.

name: Codem-isoboxer A small browser-based MPEG-4 (ISOBMFF) parser.
Dynamorse
description: IT swiss army knife - a Node-RED media pipeline builder, adding professional media processing nodes.

name: FFmpeg
description: A complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video.

name: FFmbc
description: FFmpeg customized for broadcast and professional usage.

name: GStreamer
description: A library for constructing graphs of media-handling components.

name: KFR
description: Fast, modern C++ DSP framework, DFT/FFT, Audio resampling, FIR/IIR, Biquad.

name: L-SMASH
description: A rigidly spec-compliant ISOBMFF library, which has full DASH muxing support.

name: LibAV
description: Open source audio and video processing tools.

name: Libebur128
description: A library that implements the EBU R 128 standard for loudness normalisation.

name: Loudness Validator
description: A set of applications to analyse, visualise and correct the loudness.

name: MP4Box.js
description: JavaScript library to process MP4 files in the browser (and in NodeJS).

name: Open Broadcast Encoder
description: Broadcast encoder built from Open Source components.

name: Photon
description: Implementation of the SMPTE Material Exchange Format (MXF) file specification.

name: SoX
description: The Swiss Army knife of sound processing programs.

name: TuttleOFX
description: TuttleOFX is an open source image processing framework based on OpenFX plugin standard.

name: UPipe
description: Upipe is primarily designed to be the core of a multimedia player, transcoder or streamer.

name: BBC Media Storage Meter
description: An application for the testing of network attached storage, originally assumed to be used for the streaming of professional media.

name: BeaqleJS
description: BeaqleJS provides a framework to create browser based listening tests for subjective audio quality assessment.

name: MediaConch
description: Implementation checker, policy checker, & reporter for Matroska, FFV1, & PCM.

name: MediaInfo
description: MediaInfo provides a convenient unified display of the most relevant technical and tag data for video and audio files.

name: QCTools
description: Quality Control tools for video preservation to analyse digitized video files

name: Sonic Visualiser
description: An application for viewing and analysing the contents of music audio files.

name: VMAF
description: Perceptual video quality assessment based on multi-method fusion.

name: Wisual
description: A web service for Visual Quality Assessment, which supports PSNR, SSIM, VQM, etc.

name: Audacity
description: Cross-platform software for recording and editing sounds

name: Airtime
description: Radio management application for remote broadcast automation (via web-based schedule)

name: Rivendell
description: Complete radio broadcast automation solution, translated to many languages and used worldwide.

name: CRC mmbTools
description: Original Tools for DAB digital radio multiplexing and software defined radio modulation.

name: ODR mmbTools
description: Fork, continuation of CRC mmbTools. Adding new features for 24/24 365/365 live operation, DAB+, associated data (slideshow, text), distributed infrastructure, SFN.

name: CCExtractor
description: A tool that analyzes video files and produces stand-alone subtitle files.

name: GStreamer TTML subtitling package
description: A means for GStreamer pipelines to parse and render  EBU-TT-D (TTML) subtitles.

name: EBU-TT-D Subtitling within dash.js
description: The original fork of dash.js to experiment with XML based subtitles like EBU-TT-D within dash.js. Uses an HTML/CSS overlay. Has since been integrated into dash.js.

name: EBU-TT-D W3C XML Schema
description: Informative EBU-TT-D XML Schema to support the implementation of EBU Tech 3380.

name: EBU-TT Live Interoperability Toolkit
description: A set of components for generating, testing and distributing subtitle documents in the EBU-TT Live format.

name: IRT EBU-TT-D Application Samples
description: EBU-TT-D sample files, related PNG images and mp4 videos showing how they should be rendered.

name: Subtitling Conversion Framework (SCF)
description: A set of modules for converting subtitle formats. Main target is the conversion of EBU STL and EBU-TT subtitle files. Alpha release.

name: Timed Text Toolkit (ttt)
description: A collection of related tools that provide support for or make use of the W3C Timed Text Markup Language (TTML).

name: BBC R&D
description: BBC Research and Development. Checkout the weekly notes.

name: 3D CineCast
description: A curation about new media technologies.

name: Canal+
description: CANAL+ Open Source Community.

name: The Netflix Tech Blog
description: A Netflix blog focused on technology and technology issues.

description: What's happening with engineering and developers at YouTube.
